name: Eurostat
short_description: EU-level statistics and macro-economic indicators (economy, population, employment...)

name: ISTAT
short_description: Italian national statistics office (demography, employment, prices, national accounts...)

name: Banca d'Italia
short_description: Data from the Italian central bank (monetary, financial, balance of payments, banking system)

name: EDW
short_description: Internal Enterprise Data Warehouse integrating core operational and financial systems

name: EIA
short_description: U.S. Energy Information Administration – official energy data (generation, consumption, fuel, prices).

name: FERC
short_description: U.S. Federal Energy Regulatory Commission – market, transmission, and financial filings for utilities.

name: NERC
short_description: North American Electric Reliability Corporation – reliability standards, disturbances, and system performance data.

name: EPA
short_description: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency – environmental and emissions data relevant to power sector and fuels.

name: PUDL
short_description: Public Utility Data Liberation – cleaned, imputed, directly usable datasets derived mainly from EIA, FERC, EPA and SEC.
collection: Open S3 bucket / Zenodo direct download / Kaggle (colab) notebook

name: BRC
short_description: Blockchain Research center - data on demand, (cryptocurrencies, financial news, BTC futures...).

name: Binance
short_description: Binance's free API allows collection of historical OHLC data for most pairs at high frequency

name: Thegraph
short_description: TheGraph allows free access to curated datastreams on the blockchain - including on-chain data on popular DEFI protocols (uniswap,aave...)
collection: API / free limited key - requires base wallet

name: FRED
short_description: Federal Reserve Economic Data - macro-economic time series data on US market

name: Dune
short_description: Dune allows access to on-chain data including multiple pre-made queries about various DeFi projects
